conversation_title: Jaguar: Animal, Car Brand, Console, Maya God
description: Tests ability to distinguish Jaguar the animal, Jaguar the car brand, Jaguar the Atari console, and Jaguar the Maya god across 25 steps with cross-domain queries.

conversations.message: The word 'Jaguar' has multiple meanings - animal, car, gaming console, and deity
conversations.expected: Jaguar: big cat species, British luxury car brand, 1990s Atari console, Maya jaguar god
conversations.linear_failure_risk: none - establishing multi-domain context

conversations.message: Tell me about the jaguar animal
conversations.expected: Jaguar (Panthera onca) is largest cat in Americas, third-largest worldwide. Native to Central/South America. Strongest bite of big cats at 1,500 PSI. Spotted coat with rosettes. Solitary, apex predator. Swims well, hunts caimans
conversations.linear_failure_risk: low - first domain

conversations.message: What is Jaguar the car company?
conversations.expected: Jaguar Cars is British luxury vehicle manufacturer founded 1922 (originally Swallow Sidecar Company). Known for E-Type, XJ, F-Type sports cars. Owned by Tata Motors since 2008. Leaping jaguar hood ornament. Headquarters in Coventry, England
conversations.linear_failure_risk: moderate - second domain introduced

conversations.message: Describe the Atari Jaguar console
conversations.expected: Atari Jaguar is video game console released 1993. Marketed as first 64-bit system. Commercial failure - only ~250,000 sold. Notable games: Alien vs Predator, Tempest 2000. Discontinued 1996. Known for complex architecture, limited game library
conversations.linear_failure_risk: moderate - three domains active

conversations.message: Tell me about the Maya jaguar deity
conversations.expected: Jaguar god of terrestrial realm in Maya mythology. Symbol of power, night, underworld. Maya rulers wore jaguar pelts. Associated with warfare. Temple of the Jaguar at Tikal. God of the number seven
conversations.linear_failure_risk: high - four domains, baseline starting to conflate

conversations.message: What's the jaguar's bite force?
conversations.expected: 1,500 PSI - strongest bite of all big cats
conversations.linear_failure_risk: high - step 2 animal details now 4 messages back

conversations.message: Who owns Jaguar Cars now?
conversations.expected: Tata Motors (Indian company) since 2008
conversations.linear_failure_risk: critical - baseline mixing animal ownership with car company ownership

conversations.message: When was Atari Jaguar released?
conversations.linear_failure_risk: critical - dates mixing across domains

conversations.message: What did the jaguar symbolize to Maya?
conversations.expected: Power, night, underworld, warfare. Rulers wore jaguar pelts as status symbol
conversations.linear_failure_risk: catastrophic - step 5 mythology now 4 messages back, baseline completely mixing domains

conversations.expected: Central and South America - rainforests, swamps, grasslands
